validation.message: Please see individual checks for details

checks.message: 'samples' section must contain exactly one sample in metadata, 2 found
The total number of read groups in 'read_groups' section is 3. It does NOT match the number specified in read_group_count: 4.
File(s) specified in 'file_r1' or 'file_r2' missed in 'files' section of the metadata JSON: test_rg_4.bam
'fileName' must NOT contain path in the 'files' section of the metadata, offending name(s): 'seq/test_rg_3.bam'

All files in the 'files' section of the metadata JSON are required to have 'info.data_category' field being populated with 'Sequencing Reads'. File(s) found not conforming to this requirement: 'seq/test_rg_3.bam, test_rg_3.bam'.

All files in the 'files' section of the metadata JSON are required to have 'dataType' field being populated with 'Submitted Reads'. File(s) found not conforming to this requirement: 'seq/test_rg_3.bam'.
